x-dex.swap.title: Swap
x-dex.swap.slippage.tolerance.tip: Your transaction will revert if the price changes unfavorably by more than this percentage.
x-dex.swap.transaction.deadline.tip: Your transaction will revert if it is pending for more than this period of time.
x-dex.swap.deadline.tip: Your transaction will revert if it is pending for more than this period of time.
x-dex.swap.token.modal.title: Select a token
x-dex.swap.token.modal.description: Select a token from our default list or search for a token by symbol or address.
x-dex.swap.confirm.tip: Output is estimated. You will receive at least {amount} or the transaction will revert.

x-dex.send.title: Send
x-dex.send.to.placeholder: An address e.g. 0x... or a CIS name
x-dex.liquidity.title: Liquidity
x-dex.liquidity.remove.tip: If you add the first liquidity of this LP, it will be stored in LpVault and the quantity of this LP will not be displayed in your wallet.
x-dex.liquidity.no.slc.pair.address.tip: Swap SLC Initial pool not found. You need to first set up an initial pool using the SLC.
x-dex.liquidity.no.pair.address.tip: Initial pool not found. You need to first set up an initial pool using the SLC.
x-dex.liquidity.less.then.tip: When adding liquidity for the first time, the amount of each currency must be greater than or equal to 1000 $SLC.
x-dex.pools.title: Liquidity pools
x-dex.pools.label: Pools
x-dex.pools.create.tip: Initial liquidity of the pool will be locked in the LP vault, it can be unlocked only if there is the only LP.
x-super-libra-coin.title: Mint & Burn
x-super-libra-coin.description: Direct SLC minting: Each currency can be directly minted at 96% to 99% of the SLC value, and the currency used for minting can be redeemed as specified currency at 95% value.
x-lending.health.risk.title: Liquidation risk parameter
x-lending.health.risk.description: The assurance of your collateral and  loan to value determine your health factor. To avoid liquidations you can supply more collaterals or repay borrow positions.
x-lending.health.factor.detail: Safety of your deposited collateral against the borrowed assets and its underlying value. If the health factor goes below 1, the liquidation of your collateral might be triggered.
x-lending.health.LTV.detail: Your current loan to value based on your collateral supplied. If your loan to value goes above the liquidation threshold your collateral supplied may be liquidated.
x-lending.borrow.mode.description: The mode can only be changed when there are no deposits or loans.
x-lending.borrow.mode.slc.description: Select the borrow mode when you donâ€™t have any loan.
x-lending.borrow.mode.high.title: High liquidity mode
x-lending.borrow.mode.high.description: Use high liquidity collateral for borrowing
x-lending.borrow.mode.risk.title: Risk isolation mode
x-lending.borrow.mode.risk.description: Only use one selected high-risk asset to borrow
x-lending.borrow.mode.homogenous.title: Homogenous mode
x-lending.borrow.mode.homogenous.descrip: Only use homogenous asset for borrowing
x-lending.borrow.mode.high.detail: To enable High liquidity mode, all deposits and borrow positions must be closed and only allows you to borrow assets belonging the selected mode.
x-lending.borrow.mode.risk.input.label: Select isolation asset
x-lending.borrow.mode.risk.detail: To enable Risk isolation mode, all deposits and borrow positions must be closed and only allows you to borrow assets belonging the selected mode.
x-lending.borrow.mode.homogenous.detail: To enable Homogenous mode, all deposits and borrow positions must be closed and only allows you to borrow assets belonging the selected mode.
x-lending.borrow.detail: Borrowing this amount will reduce your health factor and increase risk of liquidation.
x-lending.repay.detail: You donâ€™t have enough funds in your wallet to repay the full amount. If you proceed to repay with your current amount of funds, you will still have a small borrowing position in your dashboard.t
x-lending.withdraw.detail: Withdraw this amount will reduce your health factor and increase risk of liquidation.
